input.sentences: our small town was started by as small group of immigrants .
every year we celebrate with a parade .
we run our buses with flags all over them .
different musicians walk the streets playing their music .
output.sentences: Our town was started by immigrants years ago.
Every year we get to celebrate our towns pride with a parade.
We get to display our flags in celebration.
Some people volunteered to play some music and they did a great job.
We also had a few male impersonators like Elvis.
